msg: * perl/Fs.pm: Wrapper for svn_fs_path_change_kind_t and svn_fs_path_change_t.

msg: * doc/book/book/ch09.xml: Markup fixes and line wraps.

author: philip
msg: Fix the mechanism that combines client sleeps, it was not properly
eliminating intermediate sleeps on checkout.  This speeds up all
checkouts, but is most noticeable when running externals_tests.py
instead of svn_client_update so that the sleep flag can be passed.

author: julianfoad
msg: Web site: clean up the description of future plug-in diff support.
Mention that we already support plug-in diff for text files.
